solution_line_template: The total height of the first to {num_floors_1_to_100}th floor is {num_floors_1_to_100} x {height_per_floor_1_to_100} = <<{num_floors_1_to_100}*{height_per_floor_1_to_100}={height_floors_1_to_100}>>{height_floors_1_to_100} feet.
Hence, the 101st floor is {total_height_taipei_101} - {height_floors_1_to_100} = <<{total_height_taipei_101}-{height_floors_1_to_100}={height_101st_floor}>>{height_101st_floor} feet high.
